name: WOMENHEART
sampleDescriptions: Policies supporting female cardiovascular disease patients, research around cardiovascular disease
Passage of the Heart Health Enhancement through Access to Research and Training Act (H.R. 880), the Treat and Reduce Obesity Act of 2023 (H.R. 4818/S. 2407), and the SAFE STEP Act (H.R. 2630/S. 652)
